channel.title: Which network card do you recommend?
channel.description:
Hi,
I'd like to learn more about wifi attack, how to deauth, create rogue access points and so on. I'm gonna buy a card to do this and I eared that those from Alfa Network are very good.
Do you guys use these, which model do you prefer ? Or do you use another brand ?
Also if you have any good stuff to help me learn about wifi attacks that you'd like to share I'd be happy to read it :D
Thanks guys
